00022 #include <stdio.h>
00023 #include <string.h>

00030 #include "linux_file.hpp"

00032 namespace uStreamLib {
00033         Impl_File::Impl_File(void)
00034                 : _fd(-1)
00035         {
00036                 // Nothing to do.
00037         }
00038 
00039         Impl_File::~Impl_File(void)
00040         {
00041                 closeFile();
00042         }
00043 
00044         int32 Impl_File::openFile(char* pathname, int32 mode)
00045         {
00046                 int32 sys_mode = 0;
00047 
00048                 // close previous open file
00049                 closeFile();
00050 
00051                 // check mode
00052                 if (mode == FileInputStream::FILE_MODE_READ)
00053                         sys_mode = O_RDONLY;
00054                 if (mode == FileInputStream::FILE_MODE_WRITE)
00055                         sys_mode = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT;
00056                 if (mode == FileInputStream::FILE_MODE_RW)
00057                         sys_mode = O_RDWR | O_CREAT;
00058 
00059                 int32 aux = S_IRUSR | S_IWUSR | S_IRGRP | S_IROTH;
00060 
00061                 UOSUTIL_DOUT(("IMPL(openFile): opening %s\n", pathname));
00062                 UOSUTIL_DOUT(("IMPL(openFile): mode    %d\n", mode));
00063 
00064                 // open file
00065                 _fd = ::open(pathname, sys_mode, aux);
00066                 if (_fd < 0)
00067                         return FAILURE;
00068 
00069                 // ok
00070                 return SUCCESS;
00071         }
00072 
00073         int32 Impl_File::closeFile(void)
00074         {
00075                 if (_fd >= 0)
00076                         ::close(_fd);
00077 
00078                 _fd = -1;
00079                 return SUCCESS;
00080         }
00081 
00082         int32 Impl_File::readFile(void* data, size_t size)
00083         {
00084                 if (_fd < 0)
00085                         return FAILURE;
00086                 return ::read(_fd, data, size);
00087         }
00088 
00089         int32 Impl_File::writeFile(void* data, size_t size)
00090         {
00091                 if (_fd < 0)
00092                         return FAILURE;
00093                 return ::write(_fd, data, size);
00094         }
00095 
00096         int32 Impl_File::seek(int32 offset, int32 origin)
00097         {
00098                 switch (origin) {
00099                 case FileInputStream::SEEK_ORIGIN_SET:
00100                         return ::lseek(_fd, offset, SEEK_SET);
00101                 case FileInputStream::SEEK_ORIGIN_CUR:
00102                         return ::lseek(_fd, offset, SEEK_CUR);
00103                 case FileInputStream::SEEK_ORIGIN_END:
00104                         return ::lseek(_fd, offset, SEEK_END);
00105                 }
00106 
00107                 return FAILURE;
00108         }
00109 
00110         int32 Impl_File::skip(int32 bytes)
00111         {
00112                 int32 ret = ::lseek(_fd, bytes, SEEK_SET);
00113                 if (ret < 0)
00114                         return FAILURE;
00115 
00116                 return ret;
00117         }
00118 }
